Based on your preferences for genre and actors, I would recommend "Braveheart" to you.

The movie tells the story of William Wallace, a Scottish warrior who leads his country's resistance against England during the 17th century Wars of Scottish Independence.

The movie features Gerard McSorley as William Wallace, David O'Hara as the English officer, Angus Macfadyen as the English commander, Catherine McCormack as the English admiral, Michael Byrne as a member of the English army, Brendan Gleeson as an Irish soldier, Mhairi Calvey as an Irish officer, Patrick McGoohan as an Irish general, Patrick McGoohan as an Irish general, James Robinson as an Scottish general, Mel Gibson as an English general, Alun Armstrong as an Irish general.
